name: smartercleanup-django-client
description: Standalone Shareabouts client and server package
author: SmarterCleanup

scripts.build-lib-js: cat src/sa_web/static/dist/cat-lib-bundle.js | uglifyjs -cm | tee src/sa_web/static/dist/lib-bundle.js | gzip > src/sa_web/static/dist/lib-bundle.js.gz
scripts.build-js: cat src/sa_web/static/dist/cat-bundle.js | uglifyjs -cm | tee src/sa_web/static/dist/bundle.js | gzip > src/sa_web/static/dist/bundle.js.gz
scripts.build-css: cat src/sa_web/static/dist/cat-bundle.css | tee src/sa_web/static/dist/bundle.css | gzip > src/sa_web/static/dist/bundle.css.gz
scripts.build: npm run build-scss && npm run build-concat && npm run build-lib-js && npm run build-preload-js && npm run build-js && npm run build-css
